revised_title: Environmental Impacts and Management of North Sea Oil and Gas Developments
tldr: This article reviews the history and future of North Sea oil and gas development from an environmental perspective. It discusses the development of impact assessment techniques, monitoring of the environment, and the evolution of environmental protection management practices. The paper also addresses the potential environmental impacts and future challenges as the industry moves into the northern North Sea and areas such as the West Shetland Basin.
